title: Visit the Emperor's Old Hideout
content:
hese items include: Unique Shell (X:-726, Y:586) Emperor's Wardrobe (X:-727, Y:590) Butter Fork (X:-731, Y:596) Stelmane's Portrait (X:-732, Y:597) Sword of the Emperor (X:-734, Y:589) Chains (X:-739, Y:594) Empty Brain Jar (X:-745, Y:593) Recipe for Fiddlehead Soup (X:-744, Y:587) Dog Collar (X:-742, Y:584) The hatchin hideout leads to city sewers.
